scripts.build: electron-packager ./src 'opennms-chat' --out=dist --ignore='^/dist$' --prune --asar --platform=all --arch=all --version=$npm_package_electronVersion --app-bundle-id='org.opennms.chat' --app-version=$npm_package_version --version-string.CompanyName='The OpenNMS Group, Inc.' --version-string.ProductName='OpenNMS Chat' --version-String.InternalName='OpenNMS Chat' --helper-bundle-id='org.matterfront.app.helper' --overwrite --icon=resources/opennms

ghooks.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run test
